0.content:
## üíª Online order
---
üíº Business KPI = Average order value.

1.content:
## ‚öôÔ∏è Orders processed
---
üíº Business KPI = Time from receiving an order to picking it (90th percentile).

2.content:
## üè≠ Warehouse
---
üíº Business KPI = Percentage change in orders packed in the last hour vs. same time yesterday.

3.content:
## üöö Shipping
---
üíº Business KPI = Order shipping success rate.

4.content:
## üì¶ Delivery
---
üíº Business KPI = Delivery time for "Gold" users.

14.query:
// Real example from the data of the average order value.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" and event.type == "place.order"
| makeTimeseries averageOrderValue = avg(order.value), bins:50

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.AutoA.query:
// Real example from the data of the average order value.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" and event.type == "place.order"
| makeTimeseries averageOrderValue = avg(order.value), bins:50

15.content:
### Orders by loyalty tier
---
How many unique bookings were made, and by what tier of user.

16.content:
### Average order size
---
Value over time, Davis highlights where the value is higher or lower than expected.

17.content:
### Time to pick items
---
90th percentile of time taken from receiving order to picking first item.

22.query:
// Real example from the data, of the average time to start picking an order.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" 
| filter event.type == "warehouse.received" or event.type == "item.picked"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd receiveTime = if(event.type == "warehouse.received", timestamp), pickTime = if(event.type == "item.picked", timestamp)
| summarize firstReceive = takeFirst(receiveTime), firstPick = takeFirst(pickTime), by:{order.id}
| filterOut isNull(firstReceive) or isNull(firstPick)
| fieldsAdd timeToPick = firstPick - firstReceive
| makeTimeseries ninetyTimeToPick = percentile(timeToPick, 90), time:firstPick, bins:50

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.AutoA.query:
// Real example from the data, of the average time to start picking an order.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" 
| filter event.type == "warehouse.received" or event.type == "item.picked"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd receiveTime = if(event.type == "warehouse.received", timestamp), pickTime = if(event.type == "item.picked", timestamp)
| summarize firstReceive = takeFirst(receiveTime), firstPick = takeFirst(pickTime), by:{order.id}
| filterOut isNull(firstReceive) or isNull(firstPick)
| fieldsAdd timeToPick = firstPick - firstReceive
| makeTimeseries ninetyTimeToPick = percentile(timeToPick, 90), time:firstPick, bins:50

23.content:
### Average order items per city
---
Average number of items in an order broken down by each location.

26.query:
// Real example from the data of the average order value.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" and event.type == "place.order"
| summarize averageOrderValue = avg(order.value)

28.query:
// Real example from the data, of the average time to start picking an order.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" 
| filter event.type == "warehouse.received" or event.type == "item.picked"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd receiveTime = if(event.type == "warehouse.received", timestamp), pickTime = if(event.type == "item.picked", timestamp)
| summarize firstReceive = takeFirst(receiveTime), firstPick = takeFirst(pickTime), by:{order.id}
| filterOut isNull(firstReceive) or isNull(firstPick)
| fieldsAdd timeToPick = firstPick - firstReceive
| summarize ninetyPercentile = percentile(timeToPick, 90)

32.query:
// Real example from the data of the number of successful vs failed shipments.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail"
| filter startsWith(event.type, "order.shipped")
| summarize success = countIf(event.type == "order.shipped"), fail = countIf(event.type == "order.shipped.system.outage")
| fieldsAdd shippingSuccessRate = (toDouble(fail)/toDouble(success)) * 100

33.query:
// Real example from the data of number of orders packed, per hour.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" and event.type == "order.packed"
| makeTimeseries ordersPacked = count(), interval:1h

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.AutoA.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" and event.type == "order.packed"
| makeTimeseries ordersPacked = count(), interval:1h

34.content:
### Orders packed per hour
---
Number of orders being packed, broken down hourly.

35.content:
### Shipping success rate
---
Trend of when orders are shipped successfully (üü¢) or have issues (üî¥).

36.content:
### Vouchers offered
---
Total worth of vouchers offered for shipping errors (10% of order value over $1000.)

37.query:
// Real example from the data of successful vs failed shippings.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail"
| filter startsWith(event.type, "order.shipped")
| makeTimeseries success = countIf(event.type == "order.shipped"), fail = countIf(event.type == "order.shipped.system.outage"), bins:40

39.content:
### Probable lost orders
---
Orders which started picking more than 2 hours ago and have not been packed.

40.content:
### Gold loyalty delivery time
---
Average delivery time for "Gold" loyalty members, over time.

41.query:
// Real example from the data looking at the time between shipping and order being received, for "Gold" members.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" 
| filter event.type == "order.shipped" or event.type == "order.received" or event.type == "place.order"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd shippedTimestamp = if(event.type == "order.shipped", timestamp), receivedTimestamp = if(event.type == "order.received", timestamp)
| summarize shippedTime = takeMin(shippedTimestamp), receivedTime = takeMin(receivedTimestamp), loyalty = takeAny(loyalty), by:{order.id}
| filterOut isNull(receivedTime) or isNull(shippedTime)
| filter loyalty == "gold"
| fieldsAdd deliveryTime = receivedTime - shippedTime
| makeTimeseries avgDeliveryTime = avg(deliveryTime), time:receivedTime

42.content:
### End-to-end order time
---
Total time from place order to order received, by loyalty.

45.query:
// Real example from the data looking at the time between shipping and order being received, for "Gold" members.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail" 
| filter event.type == "order.shipped" or event.type == "order.received" or event.type == "place.order"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd shippedTimestamp = if(event.type == "order.shipped", timestamp), receivedTimestamp = if(event.type == "order.received", timestamp)
| summarize shippedTime = takeMin(shippedTimestamp), receivedTime = takeMin(receivedTimestamp), loyalty = takeAny(loyalty), by:{order.id}
| filterOut isNull(receivedTime) or isNull(shippedTime)
| filter loyalty == "gold"
| fieldsAdd deliveryTime = receivedTime - shippedTime
| summarize avgDeliveryTime = avg(deliveryTime)

49.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail"
| filter event.type == "order.packed" or event.type == "item.picked"
| summarize pickedCount = countIf(event.type == "item.picked"), packedCount = countIf(event.type == "order.packed"), firstPickTime = takeFirst(timestamp), by:{order.id}
| fieldsAdd timeSinceFirstPick = (now() - firstPickTime)
| filter packedCount == 0 and timeSinceFirstPick > toDuration(7200000000000)
| makeTimeseries `Probably lost orders` = count(default:0), time:firstPickTime, bins:50
| fieldsAdd totalLostOrders = arraySum(`Probably lost orders`)

79.query:
// Real example from the data of value of "vouchers" sent to people with shipping errors - which is 10% of order value over $1000.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.retail"
| filter event.type == "order.shipped.system.outage" or event.type == "place.order"
| fieldsAdd placeOrderTime = if(event.type == "place.order", timestamp), shippingErrorTime = if(event.type == "order.shipped.system.outage", timestamp)
| summarize placeOrderTime = takeFirst(placeOrderTime), shippingErrorTime = takeFirst(shippingErrorTime), order.value = takeMax(order.value), by:{order.id}
| filter isNotNull(placeOrderTime) and isNotNull(shippingErrorTime) and order.value > 1000
| fieldsAdd order.value = order.value * 0.10
| summarize totalVoucherOffer = sum(order.value)
